entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of light snow later this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
